run_id = #{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ci_orchestration_history set run_id = #{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from ci_orchestration_history where 1=1
AND run_id LIKE CONCAT('%','${runId}','%')
and organization_code in
#{organizationCode}
order by create_date desc
